![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/408568/50227914-c5d07580-039e-11e9-9118-7b9a3d82669f.png)
This is a [geopumber]("https://github.com/ATFutures/geoplumber") app. Build 
```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(geoplumber)
gp_build()
```

and run
```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(geoplumber)
gp_plumb()
```

visit `localhost:8000`

## deploy with docker
Repo contains Dockerfile for production.
